name: tendinitis
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a medical condition in which a tendon (= a strong piece of tissue in the body connecting a muscle to a bone) becomes swollen and painful: The tennis star has been out of action for several weeks with elbow tendinitis. She is still suffering pain from tendonitis in her knee.
More examplesFewer examplesThey use a special athletic technique developed by the Japanese to keep body aches, specifically tendinitis, at bay.There are several common aging "itises" - arthritis, bursitis, tendinitis - that can literally make exercise a pain.She had developed pain from carpal tunnel syndrome in her wrists and tendinitis in her neck and arms.I have seen tendonitis in the thumbs and fingers of regular players of video games.
